website_summaries.verdict: The perfect ball pit “castle” for any little princess. A pretty option for little girls.
pros: Super cute design makes a great addition to a little girl’s room/playroom
Large enough to accommodate a couple of friends/siblings
Transparent mesh sides keep little ones from feeling isolated while they play
cons: Gender specific design is limiting for parents of both boys and girls

customer_reviews.title: She flippin loved it
customer_reviews.text: I think the lid is a lot bigger than shown in the picture but regardless the 1 year old loved it! This is with 200 balls in the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Aksterowicz

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Update: so I didn’t return it! My baby wasn’t having that. So I made some modifications. I added some sticky Velcro squares to the top to keep it on because with every movement it would come off. Now it doesn’t. Also after being opened for about a week, it finally stays up. And doesn’t fold in anymore. 😊 I changed my rating from 1 star to 4. I am so disappointed with this. My baby absolutely loves it without understanding. This thing will not stay up no matter what. She gets in and it collapses. She moves .. and it collapses. Nice thought but bad design. I’m returning not even an hour after delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sophialicious

customer_reviews.title: Eh, spend a little more for better.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly, but with a small tear at the top. Because of the price I got it for (less than $20) I wasn’t expecting something perfect, as I paid twice as much for my niece’s thru a different vendor. This is not a very sturdily made pop up tent and it shows by the price. The material is quite thin. It will serve its purpose for a short while, which I am fine with, as long as no eyes get poked out from failed stitching of the tension rods. I see duct tape in this tents future to prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Our 1 year old daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Our 1 year old LOVES the ball pit! It’s a perfect size. Made well. It can be transported very easy! All we did was open up the round zipper bag it came in and viola! - it basically popped open and set itself up! I did buy a pack of pink, blue, and purple 50 count of balls to go with it! Also works well for a good “toy” holder. lol
customer_reviews.author: Austin Belgard

customer_reviews.title: This is nice, its easy to take down
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with this one because all the blow up ball pits get popped within a half hour of my girls being in them. This is nice, its easy to take down, the top part just sits on top and if my girls are being a little wild in there it will fall off a lot but thats not a huge deal. I like how its easy to store, even though folding it up is a bit of a trick. But it holds the balls nicely and my girls have fun in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddler’s favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use as a “ball pit” for my toddler’s 1st birthday party (just for reference, there are 400 balls in there... seriously). We still play with this every day, for the past 6 months. It has a few small tears in the trim around the door... but toddlers are rough. Luckily she doesn’t care if it’s a little worse for the wear.
customer_reviews.author: LvilleAndrea

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and durable
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for my 16 month old. It’s good to know that balls have to purchased separately. The Color is vibrant and I like that the top can come off for ventilation. Sometimes with the top on it feels stuffy in there. Obviously there is plenty of room for me to get in with her as well.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan D.

customer_reviews.title: Not great for a ball pit
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so stupid. It can literally only hold one layer of balls because the front panel is only two inches tall then the door is there. The top frilly thing is a separate piece that sits on top with no way to attach it - which means it falls off the second someone climbs into the ball pit. Can’t believe I wasted money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Lane

customer_reviews.title: Scared me upon opening
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a “pop” up tent lol. I jumped when I opened it because it immediately popped open. My baby loves it. She is in the middle of putting everything she owns inside of it, so I was able to snap a pic. It’s really spacious! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Krys C

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, currently 14 months, loves her pink tent! It’s a lot bigger than I thought it would be. I was looking for something small. It pops open in seconds! And you can fold it up to put away just as easy too. It’s very cute and I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Baby is 15 months and she will not go inside right now but she’ll grab the balls out. Not really sturdy because of the material but it’s still good enough just for her.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment
customer_reviews.text: babies need entertainment and stimulation constantly so we needed cheap great things to keep her entertained throughout the day this is an awesome product I recommend it to anybody
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very good tent
customer_reviews.text: Really good study tent! Bought 2 for my daughters. They love them. Just make sure nobody is standing close when you open it. It can get dangerous, it whips out
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the price, as it's just as pictured/described and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tessra P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for child's play
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves to play in it. Pops up, folds away slides behind the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheap
customer_reviews.text: Since it's so flexible it folds in sometimes when my daughter is in the tent. I wish the roof piece velcroed on somehow because it falls off with any slight movement. The balls dont stay in the tent too well when it's being played with. The lip for the opening could have been constructed better to keep them in. Its ok for the price. I wouldnt leave my child alone in it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Aiello

customer_reviews.title: my little monster luvs it
customer_reviews.text: i got it for daughters bday and she luvs it so much and she doesn't like toys but this is defiantly a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Lll

customer_reviews.title: Even bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my little sister for Christmas. She’s 7 months old and it’s bigger than I expected. Impossible to fit back in the bag though.
customer_reviews.author: Deztiny

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with the ball and the tent was not worth the price for how cheaply made the material was!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Actually quite a bit bigger than I ever thought it would be. Good looking, easy to set up and great value for the price. Just an FYI if you plan on filling it with the plastic balls you will need about 300 of them. Initially purchased 100 and that fills only about 1/3 of the bottom. So go with 300.
customer_reviews.author: ZW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grand Daughter! She loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for my one year old niece. She had 120 plastic balls & thats plenty. I got her a blow-up one & it kept getting a hole in it. This one is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the modern day baby cage !! 😊
customer_reviews.text: It’s the cuties thing !! My niece loves it. She can play in it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Dannimitch

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product
customer_reviews.text: This was okay for price. I’ve had a few months and it already has some rips.
customer_reviews.author: j105593

customer_reviews.title: The toys were awsome
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday present for my great granddaughter she just tured 1yr she loves the toys
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this ball pit. Purchased for her first birthday and it’s become a permanent fixture in the living room. It’s a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: No door??
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 1 star because it doesn't have a door like it shows but I actually like it that way given my daughter is a handful. False advertisement but great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I mean how sturdy do you expect it to be? Love that it has a bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Got these with the balls, my niece never wants to come out!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Loved by 1 yo!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friends 1 y/o. She loves it and a year later after moving to a new home it is set up in her bedroom. I think I purchased a set of 200 balls for this on Amazon as well. Perfect size for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Giles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 1 year old grand daughter. It's very lightweight, easy to set up, take down and store. She loves playing in it. Good Bang for your Buck!
customer_reviews.author: beth savoie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my3 year old niece to replace a blow up ball pit. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fun "getaway" for granddaughters. Fill them with plastic balls for lots of fun play time!
customer_reviews.author: martie hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Liked it but the wire started coming through the bottom not even after a day.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used for kids party all the kids loved it just bought more balls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the tent with balls and it is just the tent. The top does not attach to the tent so it comes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Parris D

customer_reviews.title: Cute tent
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this for her first birthday present. Only down fall is the top seems to slip off and has difficulty staying on. Other than that great for a ball pit and nap time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought it for my grand daughters 1st Birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It popped right up and stayed up, super cute, but I didnt get the top like I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Happy birthday to my Grandaughter she loves it! Easy to put up. Fun to play in Grandma can play inside also. Double win!!
customer_reviews.author: Cammie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift--mom and little one both love it!
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice little ball pit the thing that cost the most is buying balls! You need atleast 300-400 to fill it up
customer_reviews.author: Allysa Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I already had the balls so it was good to get kids luv it
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size! Easy to fold and take on the go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pig Rooting Tent
customer_reviews.text: I did not get this for a child it was for my Pig to root in ! It's perfect size and easy to move if I need to make room for people coming over!!
customer_reviews.author: chelsey o'brien

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it. Haven't came across any safety issues either
customer_reviews.author: Ron T

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed we had to return the gift
customer_reviews.text: Did not find the following warning until after I received the tent and saw it on the package label: NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 36 MONTHS. Very disappointed we had to return the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Sheets

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy! I love it I have a 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy! I love it I have a 8 year old and 10 month old and they both fit and enjoy playing in it.
customer_reviews.author: jANET MONTIEL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love it see both of them playing inside I love thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pamela  M. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this and it is easily tucked into a corner for out of the way storage! Easy to clean !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughters first birthday and she absolutely loves it!! It was a much nicer quality than I was expecting it to be. I would definitely recommend this to a friend. Iwill say if you want to fill it will balls it's going to take probably 250-300.
customer_reviews.author: sdmc5080

customer_reviews.title: Wet cute. Large. You r ally need hundreds ...
customer_reviews.text: Wet cute. Large. You r ally need hundreds of balls to fill this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Veen Calvert

customer_reviews.title: Great tent and easy to fold if you need to store it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter and she loves it! it is not really big and fits in her room just great! (her room is not very big) It also folds up easily if you need to store it away. Just a heads up,the balls are separate so, we had to order 2 bags of balls for the play tent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product - no way to hold rooftop or secure base
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy and if the kids lay on the edge it falls. No attachments for the rooftop and no way to secure the base on the floor. Example, I put it on the backyard and no way to attached to the ground and with wind it flew out.
customer_reviews.author: Eitt

customer_reviews.title: Cute and made well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a ball pit and it works well. No problems or complaints. Arrived on time and made a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this ball pit but I seriously dont understand why the top doesn't stay on. It's like a waste because once it moves or is knocked a little the top goes flying. Also it easily folds in on itself. But it's not dangerous just happens. But again my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Duryion Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Does not include the balls
customer_reviews.text: This ball pit does not require and assemble. It just pops up and comes with a top that comes right off. Bought this for my 8 month old grand daughter who loves it. Had to purchased the balls separately
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 1st bday present!
customer_reviews.text: My little cousin LOVES it. She crawled in it the first time we put it up for her and she enjoyed playing with her play balls inside and of it. It’s the perfect size for her and her room. It’s so cute and I’m glad I got it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Marie93

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for her room doesnt take a lot of space but big enough for her. Will be taking this on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great for a makeshift ball pit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this! We made it into a ball pit and she spends hours in and out of this little pop up castle
customer_reviews.author: Kira Mahovlich

customer_reviews.title: The kid loves it :)
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute and my daughter loves it. However it doesn’t have a tall enough lip on the entrance and the balls are constantly coming out when she climbs in or out or even just moves a little bit. But overall she’s happy with it so It’s worth it :)
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Cute ball pit tent and baby girl loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby is 11 months old. She crawled in and played inside right away. It seems sturdy and folds up nicely to tuck away. We will enjoy this ball pit tent for some time. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My grand baby loves it. Compact and easy to store
customer_reviews.author: cita

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter can't get enough time with it. She is one year old and loves it
customer_reviews.author: John with Simply Yoga Sport

customer_reviews.title: You need hundreds to actually fill and have a good time.
customer_reviews.text: SO much bigger than I had anticipated. The balls they tell you to order are so small, too. You need hundreds to actually fill and have a good time.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: the baby loved it: )
customer_reviews.text: it was a birthday gift, the baby loved it :)
customer_reviews.author: Debbra Brown.... i've been waiting for a month for my delivery that was supposed to get here Feb 2nd....

customer_reviews.title: balls sold separately.
customer_reviews.text: If you're like my boyfriend, this won't help you because he didn't read the reviews or the description.. this does NOT come with the balls.. I can't figure out how to get it back in it's case.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kelley

customer_reviews.title: but I found that very useful for filling and emptying the balls
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old granddaughter lived going in and out and reaching in for balls. The top does come off, but I found that very useful for filling and emptying the balls. At a play date with a 3 year old and 15 month old, the tent and balls were a big hit. They played for about an hour without getting bored.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Wilkirson

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 22 month old granddaughter. It was a hit! She was so excited. She opened this first on Christmas Eve and then wouldn't get out of it to open her other gifts. So we had to bring her gifts for her to open inside her ball pit. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: shiningautumn

customer_reviews.title: She loved it! Easy to set up and put away
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece's second birthday. She loved it! Easy to set up and put away. Super cute design. It was such a hit, I bought a second one for another birthday gift for a one year old. So many uses for this sweet little tent and is a hit with the littles!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Snow

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my niece and she loves it! ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my niece and she loves it! It's her little hideaway.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany X

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old niece and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for Christmas 2016, very durable and larger then it appears! I definitely recommend!

product_meta.title: Famoy Folding Pink Princess Play Tent Toddler Ball Pits, Girl Toys Gifts Easy Pop Up Indoor and Outdoor Use (Balls not Included)
feature_bullets: ❤ 1-6 YEAR OLD GIRLS SAFE TOYS ❤ Pink princess ball pit play tent is made of premium high-strength memory steel holder and lab-certified fabric that is free of phthalates and lead,Suitable for 1-6 years old children, Great gift that’s guaranteed to put a big smile on their faces!!
❤ SETS UP IN SECONDS!! ❤ No Tools Required, Pop Up, Can be folded into a 11.5 inches diameter package; compact lightweight and convenient for carrying, Cleans easily with a damp cloth and soap.

❤ DESIGN IS ATTRACTIVE FOR BABIES ❤ Colorful shape hexagon kids playpen design is attractive for babies, can improve their ability to recognize colors and their physical coordination, breathable mesh design allow air to circulate freely through the play tent,Spacious Interior enough 2 little Princess（(1 - 5 years old)） to Play balls.

❤ EFFECTIVELY INCREASING HIS SOCIABILITY !❤ This small, beautiful pink princess castle will become a pop-up kingdom for your little girl whenever it is play time, It keeps your little ones occupied and active, far from the harmful electronic gadgets and games!

❤ THE PERFECT PLACE TO RELAX AND DREAM THE DAY AWAY ❤ It provides comfortable shelter for outdoor trips, Use it at parties, parks, playgrounds, beach. This kids ball pit tent is easy to fill with plastic balls. Note: This order does NOT come with any play balls! We recommend 200 of play balls

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars285 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
